dragonsurvival:config.category.general.t: General config options for Dragon Survival
ds.dragon_altar_warning2: after choosing you will die, lose all progress and find yourself in an unknown place without your inventory.
ds.cave_dragon_choice: You have chosen to be a Cave dragon.

ds.sea_dragon_choice: You have chosen to be a Sea dragon.
